citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
There is an excessive build up of fecal waste in the enclosure, primarily located under the most popular perching areas.
This waste is also building up on perching branches which come into direct contact with the birds. Accumulations of fecal
waste can lead to increased risks of disease and illness among the birds as well as attract insects and pests. Correct by
24 July 2025 by ensuring excreta and food waste is removed from primary enclosures and from under and around primary
enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Manager.
n

narrative:
3.158(a)(1) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
There is an excessive build up of fecal waste in the enclosure, primarily located under the most popular perching areas. 
This waste is also building up on perching branches which come into direct contact with the birds. Accumulations of fecal 
waste can lead to increased risks of disease and illness among the birds as well as attract insects and pests. Correct by 
24 July 2025 by ensuring excreta and food waste is removed from primary enclosures and from under and around primary 
enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Manager. 
 
 n
